data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Mungeli, Chhattisgarh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mungeli, Chhattisgarh, India

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 54,509, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Mungeli, Chhattisgarh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 55,800 souls in Mungeli and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Teli (Hindu traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, guide the 614 believers in Mungeli to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Father, please give the church in the county of Mungeli prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Mungeli, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 55,800.

We estimate Mungeli has 614 people who might know Jesus, 677 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 54,509 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Mungeli words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
